0: The lobby is vibrant with sound and activity each evening especially the weekend nights
Many side trips available such as fishing snorkeling boating horseback riding golf
the place have a great ambient and great bartenders the activity rooms are always surprising
Great hotel if you like activities
I had the best time with Craig Johnston at the Caribbean Dance sport event
Made sure that all of our dinner reservations were great and able to get us great golf outings at the dorado
The hotel itself offers many things to do club casino spa restaurants shops lounge pools pvt beach entrance etc
The lobby area is full of activity at night and very nice decorated
1: The only closed places were the spa 1 restaurant and the fitness center
On a positive I checked out of this pretentious hotel and went back to Condado area where its safe and there are numerous restaurants and activities that do not require a 20 cab ride one way
One of the polside staffers saw that there were kids in the pool alone their mom was nearby and went over the engage them in a game of pool to polside volleyball
He took my side in some good natured ribbing of my wife who refused to let me continue our vacation each morning until we first exercised
The spa is also closed and the gym is located in a guest room
2: We walk over to the room it was a pool suite or something similar in name over n Lear the new gym facility
The bonus was Maria and Ephraim coming up to the roof with a tray filled with cold towels and ice cold water after my workout
From the lobby to the pools or the gym you will find many details that will amazed you
And the gym smelled and did not seem like was cleaned daily
The gym exercise facility however was great
I called to ask when it would be wrapped up and was informed that the music will stop at 3 am when the activity is complete
Aerobics the gym has numerous machines on the 2nd floor and the roof 3rd floor has punching bags and an area that supports a Cross Fit workout
They do massages at the beach and they have activities jet skiing banana boat
The photo was taken from our room with a view of the pool ocean and fitness facilities
Tennis courts were double booked with no balls
